text: Have you heard of the charity "Save the Children"?
yes I have
It is amazing! For 20 cents you can feed a child for 6 months and increase their likelihood of exceeding at school by 99%
I am willing to give 20 cents of my task for saving the children
That's great!  These donations help save kids for gorilla war fare and allow them to experience some sort of childhood
I have researched this charity and am glad to be a part of donating my task money to help them
I'm so happy to hear that! We need more supporters like you!
I plan to do the same for other mturkers I speak with
Do you have any friends you'd be willing to compel to donate to save the children?
I am homebound at the moment, but I will reach out to other workers and ask them to donate
Amazing! You can share the website  URL that will give them information and a link to donate
Just copied it, thank you for the information I hope you get rewarded!!!
We are all rewarded when we help the less fortunate!
100%, I am on board for assisting everyone in need
I really appreciate your support.  However much you decide to donate will be deducted from your task payment.  How much would you like to donate at this time?
20 cent at this time, I am also sending the site to other mturkers
I am confirming your donation of 20 cents?
ok, I appreciate your time
Thank you so much! Your support will do so much for children in need
thank you, have an incredible night
